00022 
00023 void DirListManager::onAdd() {
00024         
00025         // ask user to select the directory
00026         QString dir = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, 
00027                 tr("Select a directory"), baseDir_.absolutePath());
00028 
00029         // if nothing was chosen or cancel was clicked
00030         if (dir.isEmpty()) {
00031                 return;
00032         }
00033 
00034         // create QDir instance that refers to the base location.
00035         QDir baseDir(baseDir_.absoluteDir());
00036 
00037         // get the relative directory path
00038         QString relDir = QDir::cleanPath(baseDir.relativeFilePath(dir));
00039 
00040         // if the directory was the same as the base directory
00041         if (relDir.isEmpty()) {
00042                 return;
00043         }
00044 
00045         // create a relative path from base to selected file and clean it 
00046         model_.appendItem(relDir);
00047 
00048         // inform that content of the widget has changed
00049         emit contentChanged();
00050 }
00051 
00052 void DirListManager::onEdit() {
00053         
00054         // ask the view for the selected index
00055         QModelIndex index = view_.currentIndex();
00056 
00057         // if index was invalid (nothing was chosen)
00058         if (!index.isValid()) {
00059                 return;
00060         }
00061 
00062         // get the old text that is currently stored in the model
00063         QString oldDir = model_.data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00064 
00065         QString newDir = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, 
00066                 tr("Select a directory"), baseDir_.absolutePath());
00067 
00068         // create QDir instance that refers to the base location.
00069         QDir baseDir(baseDir_.absoluteDir());
00070 
00071         // create a new file path to selected file that is relative to the base
00072         QString newRelDir = QDir::cleanPath(baseDir.relativeFilePath(newDir));
00073 
00074         // if new relative dir was empty then dont change anything
00075         if (newRelDir.isEmpty()) {
00076                 return;
00077         }
00078         // if the file path changed
00079         else if (oldDir != newRelDir) {
00080                 model_.replace(index, newRelDir);
00081 
00082                 // inform that content of the widget has changed
00083                 emit contentChanged();
00084         }
00085 }
